name: Hyper Space Capitalism
description:
In the not so distant future of 1983, capitalism was discovered in an ancient tomb by one Theodore J. Capitalism. This allowed the world to enter into the world of hyperspace, where anger attacks the hearts and minds of peope. Will you be able to defend your heart and get a higher score than all your friends and family?


With that insanity aside, this is HSC, a small game made for the GMTK gamejam 2021, I worked on the game as a one man team. The game isn't as deep as I originally intended, however it's in a functional state and has let me explore the design space I wanted.

Special thanks to:
Poky <3
And Finn for agreeing to help

And of course I can't forget to give a special thanks to Gax, who lent their voice to the opening.
